name: Big Trouble Coming !!
description:
The Earth is in troubles , a huge asteroid is coming and you are the only one who can save us.

Manage your money correctly and choose  the correct components for your misile .

Make bigger , faster and more explosive your misiles for destroying the asteroid by reducing his size 

If you dont act fast and chose wisely the planet will dissapear.

Good luck.

Controllers: 

WASD ----- For moving 

E ------------For interacting with the machines 

MOUSE----For the Menus

K ------ SUICIDE (recommended)
